1012	def load_cost_data(self, connection=None):
1013		self.df_compensation = read_compensation_data(connection,
1014												table=self.paras_paths['input_compensation'],
1015												scenario=self.scenario)
1016
1017		self.df_doc = read_doc_data(connection,
1018								table=self.paras_paths['input_doc'],
1019								scenario=self.scenario)
1020
1021		df_np_cost = read_non_pax_cost_data(connection,
1022											table=self.paras_paths['input_non_pax_cost'],
1023											scenario=self.scenario)
1024
1025		df_np_cost = df_np_cost.set_index(['scenario_id', 'phase'])
1026
1027		df_np_cost = df_np_cost.T.stack()
1028		df_np_cost = df_np_cost.apply(pd.to_numeric)
1029
1030		df_np_cost['FSC'] = df_np_cost['base']
1031		df_np_cost['LCC'] = (df_np_cost['base'] + df_np_cost['low'])/2.
1032		df_np_cost['REG'] = (df_np_cost['base'] + df_np_cost['low'])/2.
1033		df_np_cost['CHT'] = (df_np_cost['base'] + df_np_cost['low'])/2.
1034		df_np_cost['XXX'] = (df_np_cost['base'] + df_np_cost['low'])/2.
1035		df_np_cost = df_np_cost[['FSC', 'LCC', 'REG', 'CHT', 'XXX']]
1036		df_np_cost = df_np_cost.unstack().T
1037
1038		self.dict_np_cost = df_np_cost.groupby(level=0).apply(lambda df_np_cost: df_np_cost.xs(df_np_cost.name).to_dict()).to_dict()
1039
1040		df_np_cost_fit = read_non_pax_cost_fit_data(connection,
1041													table=self.paras_paths['input_non_pax_cost_fit'],
1042													scenario=self.scenario)
1043
1044		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.set_index(['scenario_id', 'phase'])
1045
1046		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.T.stack()
1047		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.apply(pd.to_numeric)
1048
1049		df_np_cost_fit['FSC'] = df_np_cost_fit['base']
1050		df_np_cost_fit['LCC'] = (df_np_cost_fit['base'] + df_np_cost_fit['low'])/2.
1051		df_np_cost_fit['REG'] = (df_np_cost_fit['base'] + df_np_cost_fit['low'])/2.
1052		df_np_cost_fit['CHT'] = (df_np_cost_fit['base'] + df_np_cost_fit['low'])/2.
1053		df_np_cost_fit['XXX'] = (df_np_cost_fit['base'] + df_np_cost_fit['low'])/2.
1054		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit[['FSC', 'LCC', 'REG', 'CHT', 'XXX']]
1055		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.unstack().T
1056		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.unstack()
1057		df_np_cost_fit.columns = df_np_cost_fit.columns.swaplevel()
1058		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.stack()
1059
1060		self.dict_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.groupby(level=0).apply(lambda df_np_cost_fit: df_np_cost_fit.xs(df_np_cost_fit.name).to_dict()).to_dict()
1061
1062		#Read curfew costs data
1063		self.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs = read_nonpax_cost_curfews(connection,
1064															curfew_cost_table=self.paras_paths['input_cost_curfews'],
1065															scenario=self.scenario)
1066
1067		self.dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs = read_estimated_avg_costs_curfews(connection,
1068																				curfew_estimated_avg_table=self.paras_paths['input_estimated_cost_curfews'],
1069																 				scenario=self.scenario)
1070
1071		#Remove from non-pax cost the pax-cost to avoid double counting
1072		for w in self.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs.keys():
1073			avg_pax_cost = self.dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs.get(w)
1074			pcost = 0
1075			if avg_pax_cost is not None:
1076				pcost = avg_pax_cost['avg_duty_of_care']+avg_pax_cost['avg_soft_cost']+avg_pax_cost['avg_compensation_cost']+avg_pax_cost['avg_transfer_cost']
1077
1078			self.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs[w]=max(self.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs[w]-pcost,0)
1079

1117	def load_atfm_at_airports(self, connection=None):
1118		# TODO: rename things here, it's quite confusing...
1119		self.airports_already_with_reg_list = []
1120
1121		if self.manual_airport_regulations is not None:
1122			if np.isnan(self.manual_airport_regulations):
1123				self.manual_airport_regulations=None
1124		if self.manual_airport_regulations is not None:
1125			#We have regulations at airports manually defined
1126			#mmprint("Reading ATFM reg. in DB for manually defined", self.manual_airport_regulations)
1127
1128			self.df_dregs_airports_manual = read_ATFM_at_airports_manual(connection,
1129														regulation_at_airport_table=self.paras['input_atfm_regulation_at_airport_manual'],
1130														scenario="'"+self.manual_airport_regulations+"'")
1131
1132			self.regulations_day_manual = "'" + str(self.df_dregs_airports_manual.loc[0, 'reg_period_start']).split(' ')[0]+"'"
1133
1134			#self.define_regulations_airport(dregs_airports, regulations_day)
1135
1136			self.airports_already_with_reg_list = self.df_dregs_airports_manual.icao_id.drop_duplicates().to_list()
1137
1138		self.regulations_day_all = None
1139
1140		if self.stochastic_airport_regulations=="R":
1141			self.draw_regulation_day()
1142		elif self.stochastic_airport_regulations=="D":
1143			#We have specify a day we want to model
1144			#mmprint("ATFM regulations at airports based on "+str(self.regulations_airport_day))
1145			self.regulations_day_all = "'" + str(self.regulations_airport_day)+"'"
1146		elif self.stochastic_airport_regulations=="N":
1147			pass
1148		else:
1149			# Take regulations that apply to an airport in particular
1150			# Get all days where a regulation hit this airport
1151			self.all_regulation_days = read_all_regulation_days(connection,
1152				regulation_at_airport_table=self.paras_paths['input_atfm_regulation_at_airport'],
1153				scenario=self.scenario)
1154
1155			self.regulations_at_airport_df = self.all_regulation_days.loc[self.all_regulation_days['icao_id']==self.stochastic_airport_regulations, ['day']]
1156			# read_regulation_days_at_an_airport(connection,
1157			# 										regulation_at_airport_table=self.paras['input_atfm_regulation_at_airport'],
1158			# 										airport_icao=self.stochastic_airport_regulations)
1159
1160			# # Select regulation days within the desired percentile of severity
1161			# dg = df[(df['p']>self.dict_scn['perc_day_min']) && (df['p']<=self.dict_scn['perc_day_max'])]
1162
1163			# Select a day at random
1164			# Note : we don't do it using the percentile because this way naturally draw more
1165			# often the days when there are more regulations at the airport
1166			self.draw_regulation_day()
1167
1168		self.dregs_airports_all = read_ATFM_at_airports(connection,
1169										regulation_at_airport_table=self.paras_paths['input_atfm_regulation_at_airport'],
1170										scenario=self.scenario)
1171
1172		self.dregs_airports_all['day'] = self.dregs_airports_all['day'].astype(str)
1173		self.compute_dregs_airports()
1174
1175	def compute_dregs_airports(self):
1176		if self.regulations_day_all is not None:
1177			#mmprint("Reading ATFM reg. in DB for day", self.regulations_day_all)
1178			# dregs_airports = read_ATFM_at_airports(connection,
1179			# 										regulation_at_airport_table=self.paras['input_atfm_regulation_at_airport'],
1180			# 										day=self.regulations_day_all)
1181
1182			dregs_airports = self.dregs_airports_all.loc[self.dregs_airports_all['day']==self.regulations_day_all.strip("'")]
1183			self.df_dregs_airports_all = dregs_airports[~dregs_airports.icao_id.isin(self.airports_already_with_reg_list)]
1184			#self.define_regulations_airport(dregs_airports, regulations_day)
1185
1186	def draw_regulation_day(self):
1187		if self.stochastic_airport_regulations=="R":
1188			#We should draw a random day to do the regulations of that day
1189			self.regulations_day_all = self.dregs_airports_days.loc[
1190								self.rs.choice(list(self.dregs_airports_days[(self.dregs_airports_days['percentile']>=self.dict_scn['perc_day_min'])
1191														 & (self.dregs_airports_days['percentile']<=self.dict_scn['perc_day_max'])].index),1),'day_start']
1192			self.regulations_day_all = "'" + str(list(self.regulations_day_all)[0]).replace('datetime.date','').replace(",","-").replace("(","").replace(")","").replace(' 00:00:00','')+"'"
1193			#mmprint("ATFM regulations at airports based on random historic day "+str(self.regulations_day_all))
1194		elif self.stochastic_airport_regulations=="D":
1195			pass
1196		elif self.stochastic_airport_regulations=="N":
1197			pass
1198		else:
1199			self.regulations_day_all = "'{}'".format(str(self.rs.choice(list(self.regulations_at_airport_df['day']))))
1200
1201	def reload(self, connection=None):
1202		"""
1203		This is used to draw some new variables at random, not reload
1204		all data.
1205		"""
1206
1207		self.draw_regulation_day()
1208		self.compute_dregs_airports()

This loader is used to load things from parquet files following the structure specified in OpenMercury. It inherits from ScenarioLoaderStandard as it is a simplified version (same steps but reading data in a given pre-arrange structure form)

def load_all_data(self, rs=None, connection=None, profile_paras={}, **garbage): 
756	def load_all_data(self, rs=None, connection=None, profile_paras={}, **garbage):
757		dir_name = '_'.join([str(model_version), str(self.scenario)])
758
759		if 'path' in profile_paras:
760			path = Path(profile_paras['path'])
761
762			# if self.paras.get('case_studies') is not None:
763			# 	self.case_study_config = read_toml(str(path)+'/scenario='+str(self.paras['scenario'])\
764			# 									   +'/case_studies/'+self.paras['case_study'])
765
766			if path.exists() and profile_paras['type'] ==' parquet':
767				print('Loading all data as parquet with ScenarioLoaderSimpleLocal from', path)
768				for k in self.paras:
769					if 'input_' in k:
770						self.paras[k] = 'read_parquet(\''+str(path)+'/scenario='+str(self.paras['scenario'])\
771										+'/scenario_data/'+self.paras[k]+'.parquet\')'
772						#read_parquet(\'../../input/regulation_at_airport_static_old1409.parquet\');'
773		# Random state
774		if rs is not None:
775			self.rs = rs
776		else:
777			self.rs = RandomState()
778
779		mprint('Starting loading data at', dt.datetime.now())
780		self.process = psutil.Process(os.getpid())
781		mprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
782
783		with clock_time(message_before='Getting BADA performances...',
784						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
785			self.load_scenario(connection=connection)
786			self.load_bada_performances(connection=connection)
787
788		with clock_time(message_before="Getting schedules...",
789						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
790			self.load_schedules(connection=connection)
791			self.choose_reference_datetime()
792
793		with clock_time(message_before='Getting ATFM probabilities...',
794						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
795			self.load_atfm_regulations(connection=connection)
796
797		if self.stochastic_airport_regulations == 'R' or len(self.stochastic_airport_regulations) > 1:
798			with clock_time(message_before='Getting days regulations at airports...',
799							oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
800				self.load_days_possible_regulation_at_airports(connection=connection)
801
802		with clock_time(message_before='Getting/Creating flight plans...',
803						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
804			self.load_flight_plans(connection=connection)
805
806		with clock_time(message_before='Getting curfews...',
807						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
808			self.load_curfews(connection=connection)
809
810		with clock_time(message_before='Getting airports data...',
811						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
812			self.load_airport_data(connection=connection)
813
814		with clock_time(message_before='Getting EAMAN data...',
815						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
816			self.load_eaman_data(connection=connection)
817
818		with clock_time(message_before='Getting cost data...',
819						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
820			self.load_cost_data(connection=connection)
821
822		with clock_time(message_before='Getting airline data...',
823						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
824			self.load_airline_data(connection=connection)
825
826		with clock_time(message_before='Getting flight uncertainty data...',
827						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
828			self.load_flight_uncertainty(connection=connection)
829
830		with clock_time(message_before='Getting soft cost data...',
831						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
832			self.load_soft_cost_data(connection=connection)
833
834		with clock_time(message_before='Getting pax data...',
835						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
836			self.load_pax_data(connection=connection)
837
838		with clock_time(message_before='Getting ATFM data...',
839						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
840			self.load_atfm_at_airports(connection=connection)
841
842		with clock_time(message_before='Computing flights can propagate curfew...',
843						oneline=True, print_function=mprint):
844			self.compute_list_flight_can_propagate_to_curfew()
845			mprint("Number of flights that can propagate to curfew:",len(self.l_ids_propagate_to_curfew))
846
847		mprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
def load_flight_plan_pool(self, connection=None): 
849	def load_flight_plan_pool(self, connection=None):
850		reading=True
851		read_speeds=True
852		while reading:
853			try:
854				self.df_flight_plan_pool = read_fp_pool(connection,
855														fp_pool_table=self.paras_paths['input_fp_pool'],
856														fp_pool_point_table=self.paras_paths['input_fp_pool_point'],
857														trajectory_pool_table=self.paras_paths['input_trajectory_pool'],
858														scenario=self.scenario,
859														flight_schedule_table=self.paras_paths['input_schedules'],
860														flight_subset_table=self.paras_paths['input_subset'],
861														trajectories_version=self.paras['flight_plans__trajectories_version'],
862														read_speeds=read_speeds,
863														scenario_table=self.paras_paths['input_scenario'],
864														scenario_in_schedules=self.paras['flight_plans__scenario_in_schedules'])
865				reading=False
866			except Exception as err:
867				if (("fpp.planned_avg_speed_kt" in str(err)) or ("fpp.min_speed_kt" in str(err)) or
868				   ("fpp.max_speed_kt" in str(err)) or ("fpp.mrc_speed_kt" in str(err))):
869					read_speeds=False
870				else:
871					raise(err)

def load_cost_data(self, connection=None): 
1012	def load_cost_data(self, connection=None):
1013		self.df_compensation = read_compensation_data(connection,
1014												table=self.paras_paths['input_compensation'],
1015												scenario=self.scenario)
1016
1017		self.df_doc = read_doc_data(connection,
1018								table=self.paras_paths['input_doc'],
1019								scenario=self.scenario)
1020
1021		df_np_cost = read_non_pax_cost_data(connection,
1022											table=self.paras_paths['input_non_pax_cost'],
1023											scenario=self.scenario)
1024
1025		df_np_cost = df_np_cost.set_index(['scenario_id', 'phase'])
1026
1027		df_np_cost = df_np_cost.T.stack()
1028		df_np_cost = df_np_cost.apply(pd.to_numeric)
1029
1030		df_np_cost['FSC'] = df_np_cost['base']
1031		df_np_cost['LCC'] = (df_np_cost['base'] + df_np_cost['low'])/2.
1032		df_np_cost['REG'] = (df_np_cost['base'] + df_np_cost['low'])/2.
1033		df_np_cost['CHT'] = (df_np_cost['base'] + df_np_cost['low'])/2.
1034		df_np_cost['XXX'] = (df_np_cost['base'] + df_np_cost['low'])/2.
1035		df_np_cost = df_np_cost[['FSC', 'LCC', 'REG', 'CHT', 'XXX']]
1036		df_np_cost = df_np_cost.unstack().T
1037
1038		self.dict_np_cost = df_np_cost.groupby(level=0).apply(lambda df_np_cost: df_np_cost.xs(df_np_cost.name).to_dict()).to_dict()
1039
1040		df_np_cost_fit = read_non_pax_cost_fit_data(connection,
1041													table=self.paras_paths['input_non_pax_cost_fit'],
1042													scenario=self.scenario)
1043
1044		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.set_index(['scenario_id', 'phase'])
1045
1046		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.T.stack()
1047		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.apply(pd.to_numeric)
1048
1049		df_np_cost_fit['FSC'] = df_np_cost_fit['base']
1050		df_np_cost_fit['LCC'] = (df_np_cost_fit['base'] + df_np_cost_fit['low'])/2.
1051		df_np_cost_fit['REG'] = (df_np_cost_fit['base'] + df_np_cost_fit['low'])/2.
1052		df_np_cost_fit['CHT'] = (df_np_cost_fit['base'] + df_np_cost_fit['low'])/2.
1053		df_np_cost_fit['XXX'] = (df_np_cost_fit['base'] + df_np_cost_fit['low'])/2.
1054		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit[['FSC', 'LCC', 'REG', 'CHT', 'XXX']]
1055		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.unstack().T
1056		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.unstack()
1057		df_np_cost_fit.columns = df_np_cost_fit.columns.swaplevel()
1058		df_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.stack()
1059
1060		self.dict_np_cost_fit = df_np_cost_fit.groupby(level=0).apply(lambda df_np_cost_fit: df_np_cost_fit.xs(df_np_cost_fit.name).to_dict()).to_dict()
1061
1062		#Read curfew costs data
1063		self.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs = read_nonpax_cost_curfews(connection,
1064															curfew_cost_table=self.paras_paths['input_cost_curfews'],
1065															scenario=self.scenario)
1066
1067		self.dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs = read_estimated_avg_costs_curfews(connection,
1068																				curfew_estimated_avg_table=self.paras_paths['input_estimated_cost_curfews'],
1069																 				scenario=self.scenario)
1070
1071		#Remove from non-pax cost the pax-cost to avoid double counting
1072		for w in self.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs.keys():
1073			avg_pax_cost = self.dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs.get(w)
1074			pcost = 0
1075			if avg_pax_cost is not None:
1076				pcost = avg_pax_cost['avg_duty_of_care']+avg_pax_cost['avg_soft_cost']+avg_pax_cost['avg_compensation_cost']+avg_pax_cost['avg_transfer_cost']
1077
1078			self.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs[w]=max(self.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs[w]-pcost,0)

def load_atfm_at_airports(self, connection=None): 
1117	def load_atfm_at_airports(self, connection=None):
1118		# TODO: rename things here, it's quite confusing...
1119		self.airports_already_with_reg_list = []
1120
1121		if self.manual_airport_regulations is not None:
1122			if np.isnan(self.manual_airport_regulations):
1123				self.manual_airport_regulations=None
1124		if self.manual_airport_regulations is not None:
1125			#We have regulations at airports manually defined
1126			#mmprint("Reading ATFM reg. in DB for manually defined", self.manual_airport_regulations)

1130														scenario="'"+self.manual_airport_regulations+"'")

1137

1139
1140		if self.stochastic_airport_regulations=="R":
1141			self.draw_regulation_day()
1142		elif self.stochastic_airport_regulations=="D":
1143			#We have specify a day we want to model
1144			#mmprint("ATFM regulations at airports based on "+str(self.regulations_airport_day))
1145			self.regulations_day_all = "'" + str(self.regulations_airport_day)+"'"

1148		else:
